title: Learning-Based Approach for Learning Object Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories and experience in educational content planning
context.additional_context: Development and application of assessment tools optimized for smartphone-based mobile learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain reliability and validity verification methods for measuring the educational effectiveness of learning objects.
Learners can design learning-based assessment tools that integrate formative and summative evaluations.
Develop and apply a learning object evaluation framework executable in smartphone environments
Analyze the correlation between specific instructional design elements (e.g., interactivity, feedback mechanisms) and learning outcomes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
